column2: [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] truly hates me. Before I can even think about making [sway_target.GetHerHim] like me, I should try to apologize about the past offenses that are the cause of [sway_target.GetHerHis] current animosity towards me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] wished me to know of how deeply and truly sorry [From.GetSheHe] is for causing me so much pain in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me in an attempt to apologize for the many offenses [From.GetSheHe] has subjected me to in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will forgive [From.GetHerHis] past slights and give [From.GetHerHim] another opportunity to earn my trust and friendship.
Despite my sincere show of contrition, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my apology. [From.GetHerHisCap] vile and resentful nature has clearly gotten the better over [From.GetHerHis] reason.

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is ready to forgive me for my past behavior. Unfortunately, the list of indignities I subjected [From.GetHerHim] to is a long one. I think I might need still some time before I can truly start swaying [From.GetHerHim] to my cause.
It appears [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s suspicious nature made [From.GetHerHim] wary of my apology. I might have to find another way to make [From.GetHerHim] believe that I am sincere.

I was happy to hear [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are of one mind on this issue. We will both refrain from using underhanded tactics against each other during this war.
The messenger came in this morning to inform me that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to accept my offer of peace. The war is over.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to trust me and accept my offer and meet me during a momentary truce. While it is unlikely that this meeting will result in a settlement of our dispute, it might help us to maintain a healthy relationship in spite of the war.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was flattered by the honors I bestowed upon [From.GetHerHis] troops and was happy to reciprocate them.

Sadly, [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my flattering message regarding the bravery of [From.GetHerHis] troops and the skill of [From.GetHerHis] commanders in battle. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] did not believe me to be truthful...

I have been betrayed! [From.GetTitledFirstName] took advantage of my trust to ambush me during our meeting, breaking the truce that [From.GetSheHe] [From.GetHerselfHimself] had called. I am now at [From.GetHerHis] mercy!

My plan worked brilliantly! I have caught [From.GetFirstName] during our brief meeting. While breaking the truce has considerably hurt my reputation, this trickery could bring a quick resolution to this war.

I was not wrong to trust [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The truce allowed us to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.

Thankfully, the truce I called for allowed me and [From.GetTitledFirstName] to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.

Liar! I won't fall for [From.GetHerHis] tricks!

Indeed.
How tedious.

Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] needs some more time...
Too bad.

Marvelous!
This is wonderful news!
This is the perfect opportunity to capture [From.GetHerHim]!
Curses...

What a pity.
You dishonorable scum!
Wonderful!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a good [From.GetManWoman].
Very well, I will give [From.GetHerHim] another chance.

Let peace win the day.
I will make my reasons clear.
Let us meet under armistice.

I honor the bravery of your troops.

I have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. In it, [From.GetSheHe] described in cordial and reasonable terms how our realms would greatly benefit if we maintained friendlier relations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wrote me back, informing me that [From.GetSheHe] is in absolute agreement – good relations are a necessity between rulers as wise as us.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has not responded to my letter. I have to assume that my dispassionate plea for a healthy and prosperous relation between realm did not pierce through [From.GetHerHis] skepticism.
[From.GetFirstName] is really trying [From.GetHerHis] best to impress me. I cannot deny that [From.GetHerHis] recent attempts to win my favor have been more than successful.
My attempts to sway [From.GetFirstName] have not been in vain. I am slowly but surely winning over the [From.GetManWoman]'s friendship.

I have just received the most delightful work of art from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] sent it to me without expecting anything in return. In the letter accompanying it, [From.GetSheHe] wrote that [From.GetHerHis] only hope is that I appreciate this munificent gift.

It seems I did not spend all that money in vain. [From.GetTitledFirstName] was thrilled by my gift and told me [From.GetSheHe] was struck by my thoughtful gesture. I really made a good impression on [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent no response after my generous gift. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] did not like it.

I have heard that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is sparing no compliments when talking about me to [From.GetHerHis] tribesmen. Thanks to [From.GetHerHis] kind words, I am acquiring quite the reputation in [From.GetHerHis] realm...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was struck by the stream of honors I have showered [From.GetHerHim] with. I doubt [From.GetSheHe] will soon forget my kind gesture.
My attempts to impress [From.GetTitledFirstName] were not very successful: [From.GetSheHe] has ignored all the good rumors I have spread about [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me a very detailed letter dealing with strategic warfare, taking examples from [From.GetHerHis] own studies and personal experiences in the field.

My letter was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wrote me back to thank me for the thoughtful gift, remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from it.

My dissertation on military matters was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for sharing my knowledge with [From.GetHerHim], remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my letter was cold and hastily written. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is uninterested in military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my letter.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my military dissertation was cold and disinterested. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is does not care about military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my words.

A few envoys from [From.GetTitledFirstName] have come to my court. They explained that their [From.GetTitle] believes having them stay here will help the two of us to maintain better relations with each other.
Just as expected, my diplomats were able to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] of what an honorable and trustworthy ruler I am, a [Root.GetManWoman] that is well worth [From.GetHerHis] respect.
Unfortunately, my diplomats were unable to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] of my good intentions. I am afraid I will have to try something different to earn [From.GetHerHis] trust.

I wonder if [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] would appreciate learning more about the benefits of hard work from me? I cannot think of anything else right now that would help [sway_target.GetHerHim] like me more.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me a letter describing in detail the tricks and rules of statesmanship that [From.GetSheHe] has learned during the course of [From.GetHerHis] life, hoping it would endear [From.GetHerHim] to me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] answered to my letter admitting that [From.GetSheHe] has much to learn from me and has really appreciated me taking some time off my duties as [Root.GetTitle] in order to teach [From.GetHerHim] something about statesmanship.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s answer to my letter was cold and detached. I am unsure whether [From.GetSheHe] is simply uninterested in the subject or [From.GetSheHe] thinks that I have poorly presented it, but [From.GetSheHe] was certainly not impressed by my gesture.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to gift me one of [From.GetHerHis] most prized books, hoping it will help me in my search for knowledge as it helped [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] own endeavors.
It was not easy separating myself from such a precious book, but my gesture was not in vain. [From.GetTitledFirstName] was quite impressed by my thoughtful gift.
I was shocked to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has not even attempted to read the book I gifted [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] might not be interested at all in my present.

I have just received the most depraved letter I have ever read. Under the use of clever metaphors and impeccable style, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has hidden some of the most grotesque and strangely alluring activities performed by man.
I received a response from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. In the letter, [From.GetSheHe] wrote of how much [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed reading the poetic masterpiece that I created for [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not appreciate my gift for whatever reason. I guess I will have to try thinking about some other way to tease [From.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to share some of the exotic food [From.GetSheHe] has discovered in [From.GetHerHis] many years of epicurean adventures. The packaged goods look quite fresh and extremely inviting.
I was happy to know that my offer yielded positive results. Not only has [From.GetFirstName] informed me that [From.GetSheHe] has very much appreciated my food, [From.GetSheHe] cannot wait for more.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not impressed by my offering of food. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is simply not one to enjoy eating as much as I do.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] invited me to spend an afternoon at [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetHouse], sightseeing. It wasn't a very lively experience, we barely even talked, but it was strangely soothing looking at the horizon for a few hours together...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has really appreciated my kind gesture, far more than I could have hoped for. I guess this is just further proof that I do not need to overexert myself in order to achieve excellent results.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not too impressed by my act of friendship. Perhaps I should have put a little more effort into it...

I just received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. In it, the [From.GetTitle] describes the virtues of quick thinking and resolute action. It is an interesting read to be sure, albeit very short.
Just as expected, my letter was well received by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] has written me a short message in response to congratulate me for my wisdom and foresight.
Despite my attempts to solicit a clear response from [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] remains uneasy around me. I wonder what could be the cause...

I have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. In it, [From.GetSheHe] espouses all of [From.GetHerHis] supposed virtues, and suggests that any [Root.GetTitle] would die to receive all of this attention from [From.GetHerHim] as I do.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has showered me with justly-earned praise after the kindness I did to [From.GetHerHim]. There is no doubt [From.GetSheHe] has been struck by my show of prestige.
How peculiar... [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not impressed by my generous gift. Has my splendor reached such magnitude that common people are too blinded by it to recognize what it is?
I know that there must be a way to earn [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s trust, and the best way to learn it is without a doubt talking to [sway_target.GetHerHim]. But about what?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] wrote me a letter expressing [From.GetHerHis] fervent desire to know me better, so that we can come to be good acquaintances. If nothing else, it was a thoughtful and kind gesture from [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was more than happy to talk to me about [From.GetHerHis] struggles and aspirations. In fact, [From.GetSheHe] seems to have questions for me as well.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was unmoved by my concern for [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claimed that we do not know each other well enough to reveal details about [From.GetHerHis] personal life to me.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], the Physician sent to me by [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], was very thorough in [From.GetHerHis] treatment. I feel a lot better now!

[From.GetTitledFirstName], the Physician sent to me by [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], was not as bad as I feared: [From.GetSheHe] didn't do much, but I still feel a bit better after [From.GetHerHis] visit.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], the Physician sent to me by [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], was not as good as I hoped. In fact, I fear [From.GetHerHis] treatment has worsened my condition.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me an envelope containing the rotten head of some no-name bard who, allegedly, was writing songs mocking me. Judging by the message sticking from the bard's mouth, [From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently thinks this gruesome gift will make me like [From.GetHerHim] more.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] wrote me back to inform me of how much [From.GetSheHe] has loved my gift. [From.GetSheHeCap] cannot wait to repay [From.GetHerHis] debt by sending me something terrible of [From.GetHerHis] own making.

Despite all the care that I put in preparing [From.GetHerHis] gift, [From.GetTitledFirstName] claimed that [From.GetSheHe] would have preferred if I limited myself to a simple letter wishing [From.GetHerHim] good health.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] wrote me a sublime piece of poetry. It is quite entrancing to listen to. By hearing it one would think me the most beautiful [Root.GetManWoman] on Earth...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was thoroughly impressed by my poem and openly stated that I must be the best living writer in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to be able to write such beautiful rhymes about [From.GetHerHim].
How unfortunate. After all the time I spent writing it, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not even like my poem about [From.GetHerHim].

Outrageous! [From.GetTitledFirstName] is refusing to lead my armies! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that [From.GetHerHis] obligations towards [From.GetHerHis] friend [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] have overcome [From.GetHerHis] loyalty towards me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to set aside [From.GetHerHis] sword and proclaimed that [From.GetSheHe] refuses to fight any longer for [From.GetHerHis] liege in a war against me.
I am no stranger to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s [From.GetHouse], but spending such a long period of time with my [GetFromRelation] is not something I am accustomed to.
Visiting [From.GetFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] library has made me develop a love for book and literary studies that I did not thought possible.
I have been thinking about [From.GetTitledFirstName] as of late, and of all the feats that [From.GetHerHis] tenacious spirit has allowed [From.GetHerHim] to accomplish.
Talking for so long with [From.GetTitledFirstName] has allowed me to reflect a lot upon the nature of law and honor. Maybe there are some instances where I am too strict with my judgment...
My visit to [From.Capital.GetName] was a true inspiration for me. Witnessing how brazenly [From.GetTitledFirstName] faces any danger has forced me to look in shame at my own cowardice.
I was truly struck by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s generosity during my visit, and by the joy and prestige it brought [From.GetHerHim]. Perhaps I should endeavor to be more charitable myself...
Talking so much with a chaste person such as [From.GetTitledFirstName] has started to make me question if I should put a stop to my libertine ways...
Seeing how peaceful and happy [From.GetTitledFirstName] is during my visit to [From.Capital.GetName] made me wonder if, in my search for glory, I am simply wasting my life in vain.
Talking with [From.GetTitledFirstName] has really opened my eyes regarding the many dangers of this world. Perhaps I ought to be more careful with my life...

Talking with [From.GetTitledFirstName] for so long has deeply shaken my faith in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is right, perhaps there is nothing waiting for us beyond death.

Talking with [From.GetTitledFirstName] has opened my eyes to how easily people can be manipulated by using the right words. It might not be an honest attitude, but it seems to serve [From.GetHerHim] well to avoid conflicts and be a successful [From.GetTitle]...

Witnessing how much [From.GetTitledFirstName] is able to do in a single day and the satisfaction on [From.GetHerHis] face after a job well done left a strange impression on me. Maybe I should strive to be more diligent in my own duties...

Reflecting upon my time spent with [From.GetTitledFirstName] and how respected [From.GetSheHe] is by [From.GetHerHis] subjects, I am starting to think that, being so kind and submissive might be the reason why some of my peers and vassals are so reticent to obey to my orders.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] subjected me to all sorts of delicacies and lavish feasts during my visit. Now that I am back home, I am finding myself still craving for more than what my frugal diet can offer.

Until a few weeks ago, I was sure that my duties as a [Root.GetTitle] bound me to show a certain amount of generosity towards all my subjects, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] showed me that there might be some virtue in parsimony.

During my visit I couldn't believe how comfortable my host was when talking with me as well as with all of [From.GetHerHis] other courtiers, and what positive effect [From.GetHerHis] welcoming attitude had on the entire court...

Talking with [From.GetTitledFirstName] during my visit to [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetHouse] has brought me to question my lack of honesty. Lying has always been a convenient solution to many of my problems, but is it worth the taint upon my reputation?

I always thought diminishing one's achievements was a sign of weakness, but, after witnessing [From.GetFirstName]'s behavior during my visit at [From.Capital.GetName], and seeing how positively [From.GetHerHis] humble demeanor is received by [From.GetHerHis] subjects, I wonder if I should strive to imitate [From.GetHerHim]...

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s kind and gentle spirit were a baffling thing to experience during my visit, yet I cannot deny that the warmth [From.GetSheHe] received from [From.GetHerHis] subjects because of [From.GetHerHis] kindness was strangely alluring.

Seeing how patient and responsible [From.GetTitledFirstName] was during our time together amazed me. Can a person really be so calm even in the face of adversity?
